trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration information used by <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension" />.
trans-unit.target: Define as informações de configuração usadas pelo <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" />.

trans-unit.source: The message filter table to use for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: A tabela de filtro de mensagem a ser usada para essa configuração.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> pode examinar somente os cabeçalhos de mensagens; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> and routeOnHeadersOnly parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> e o parâmetro routeOnHeadersOnly especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as mensagens devem ser expedidas na ordem em que foram enviadas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as mensagens devem ser enviadas na ordem em que foram enviadas; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> used by this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> usado por esta configuração.

trans-unit.source: The message filter table.
trans-unit.target: A tabela de filtro de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filter can examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o filtro pode examinar o corpo da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o filtro só pode examinar os cabeçalhos da mensagem; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é **true**.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages should be processed between SOAP <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />s.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as mensagens devem ser processadas entre <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />s SOAP.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages should be processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as mensagens devem ser processadas; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: SOAP processing is the process where messages are converted between SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.
trans-unit.target: Processamento de SOAP é o processo em que as mensagens são convertidas entre SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value to `false` indicates that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> should not install the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on the client endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Definir esse valor como `false` indica que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> não devem instalar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> nos pontos de extremidade do cliente.

trans-unit.source: If set to `false`, you must add your own message inspector or other code to handle some aspects of messages before they are sent.
trans-unit.target: Se definido como `false`, você deve adicionar seu próprios Inspetor de mensagem ou outro código para lidar com alguns aspectos de mensagens antes de serem enviados.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to disable SOAP processing on each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível desativar o processamento em cada ponto de extremidade SOAP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> classe.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> creates and attaches a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> set to `true` for each client endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> cria e anexa um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> com <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> definida como `true` para cada ponto de extremidade do cliente.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on a specific endpoint, create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with this value set to `false` and then attach it to the endpoint on which you do not want processing to occur.
trans-unit.target: Se você não quiser usar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> em um ponto de extremidade específico, crie um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> com esse valor é definido `false` e, em seguida, anexá-lo para o ponto de extremidade no qual você deseja não processamento ocorra.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observes that a client already has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, it does not attempt to attach another.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observa que um cliente já tem um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, ele não tentará anexar outro.

trans-unit.source: To disable the application of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on any endpoint, disable SOAP processing on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: Para desabilitar o aplicativo de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> em qualquer ponto de extremidade, desabilitar SOAP no processamento de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> is added to the client endpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A> é `true`, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> é adicionada para o ponto de extremidade do cliente <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> coleção.
